title: Herbs: The Magic Healers: A Complete Guide to Physical and Spiritual Well-Being (Paperback)
author: Paul Twitchell
description: New, revised edition. A vast storehouse of knowledge on herbs and little-known spiritual approaches to healing that directly and indirectly enhance the total well-being of the individual.
